name: The Soup Dragons
description: '''The Soup Dragons''' are a Scottish [[alternative rock]] band of the late 1980s and early 1990s. Named after a character in the 1970s children's television series ''[[Clangers]]'', the group is best known for its cover of [[the Rolling Stones]]' song "[[I'm Free (The Rolling Stones song)|I'm Free]]", which was a top 5 hit in the United Kingdom in 1990; and "Divine Thing", a top 40 hit in the United States in 1992.
